abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed credits would support a
            far-reaching reform of the trade regime, decontrol of prices
            of industrial goods, measures to encourage industrial
            exports and improvements in the tax treatment of
            enterprises. The quick disbursing proceeds of the credits
            would be sold to industrial enterprises, virtually all of
            which are privately owned, through commercial banks at the
            prevailing exchange rate, to finance imports of raw
            materials, intermediate inputs and spare parts.
